channel.title: 4errors and compiling bad (not)
channel.description:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/811/4errors.png/][IMG]http://img811.imageshack.us/img811/9386/4errors.png[/img][/URL]
there's my 4 errors, dunno how to fix it
and my server compiles fine but my client doesn't compile (I just renamed my server and the client still says welcome to teamtorva but when i log in i get log in message with new name so the client isn't compiling and since that's where the rror is in...)
I can play normally tho anyone knows how to fix it?

item.title: 4errors and compiling bad (not)
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

guthix1pker:

worked thought already so that that would do it but wasn’t sure and didn’t want 1000 errors so i asked for more expert coders! thanks!

Most of it is logic, but it’s easy to get caught out on the simplest of things. Happens to us all. Your best bet is to make a backup folder and backup a file before messing with it, then you can just restore it if you mess it up.

Read full topic

item.title: 4errors and compiling bad (not)
item.dc:creator: @The_Outsider The Outsider
item.description:
@The_Outsider wrote:

Required int, int, int.
Found int, int, int, int.

Post your updateHitData method.

You need to remove an int (i.e. loopCycle) or add one to the method.

Read full topic
